videos.description: Virginia's Isaiah Wilkins blocks Markell Johnson's layup attempt.
videos.headline: Wilkins flies high to block layup in win

videos.description: Dennis Smith Jr. shows off his skills by landing a difficult layup, then completing the 3 point play from the free throw line.
videos.headline: Smith Jr. maneuvers his way to successful 3 point play

videos.description: Virginia Head Coach Tony Bennett discusses big first half performance.
videos.headline: Virginia Head Coach Tony Bennett discusses big first half performance

videos.description: Abdul-Malik Abu slams in a huge dunk for NC State, drawing a foul in the process.
videos.headline: Abu lands explosive dunk in loss

videos.description: Abdul-Malik Abu lobs ball to Shaun Kirk who finishes the play with 3.
videos.headline: Kirk sinks 3 point jumper, gives NC State much needed confidence

videos.description: Abdul-Malik Abu slams in dunk after nice pass from Terry Henderson.
videos.headline: Abu slams in another big dunk

videos.description: Virginia Senior Guard London Perrantes discusses his performance in win over NC State
videos.headline: London Perrantes discusses his performance in win over NC State
